snippet: California lawmakers approved a $1.7 billion, three-year tax cut package early today, capping a flurry of activity in the final hours of the Legislature's 1997 session....
lead_paragraph: California lawmakers approved a $1.7 billion, three-year tax cut package early today, capping a flurry of activity in the final hours of the Legislature's 1997 session.
abstract: California lawmakers approve $1.7 billion, three-year tax cut package in final hours of Legislature's 1997 session (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; California Lawmakers Decide to Cut Taxes
